original_text:
Those the Lord has rescued will return.
    They will enter Zion with singing;
    everlasting joy will crown their heads.
Gladness and joy will overtake them,
    and sorrow and sighing will flee away.
korean_text: 여호와께 구속 받은 자들이 돌아와 노래하며 시온으로 돌아오니 영원한 기쁨이 그들의 머리 위에 있고 슬픔과 탄식이 달아나리이다

sentences.original_text: Those the Lord has rescued will return.
They will enter Zion with singing;
everlasting joy will crown their heads.
sentences.korean_translation: 영원한 기쁨이 그들의 머리에 관이 되리라.

sentences.original_text: Gladness and joy will overtake them,
and sorrow and sighing will flee away.
